metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15091 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been found in the API component of PowerDNS Authoritative 4.xup to and including 4.0.4 and 3.x up to and including 3.4.11, where someoperations that have an impact on the state of the server are still allowedeven though the API has been configured as read-only via the api-readonlykeyword. This missing check allows an attacker with valid API credentialsto flush the cache, trigger a zone transfer or send a NOTIFY.

criterions.comment: pdns package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
